mapper.select: select float_new_id, float_new_title, float_url from cahg_float_news where float_new_status = '0' ORDER BY create_date DESC limit 0,5

select float_new_title,float_new_content,date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date,author, (select name from sys_dept d where d.dept_id = c.dept_id) dept_name from cahg_float_news c where float_new_id = #{float_new_id}

select count(*) from cahg_float_news where float_new_status = '0' and 1 = 1
and (float_new_title like #{title} OR DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d') like #{title})
